scripts.build:css: node-sass --output-style expanded --precision 6 source/scss/style.scss static/css/style.css.tmp && cleancss --level 1 static/css/style.css.tmp -o static/css/style.css
scripts.build:bootstrap: cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/*.js static/js && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/*.js static/js && cp node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/*.js static/js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:fonts && npm run build:cookieconsent && npm run build:bootstrap && npm run build:generatesri && npm run clean
